apiNotifications.rateLimitHit: Too many requests, please try again later

signin.title: Sign in to your account
signin.2faDesc:
Open the two-factor authentication app on your device to view your authentication code and verify your identity.
You can also use your backup code.

signup.tos: I do accept <tos>Terms and Conditions</tos> and the <pp>Privacy Policy</pp>.

common.xCharsError: The password has to consist of at least {{amount}} characters.
common.passwordTooLong: The provided password is too long, maximum length is {{amount}} characters
common.tosError: You have to accept our TOS and privacy policy in order to use our services.
common.checkLeakedPasswordDesc: When enabled we check your password with the <db>{{database}}</db> database. We don't send your password to the service. First we hash your password (using SHA1) and send only the first 5 characters of that hash to the service. The service returns all leaked passwords that start with those 5 characters. At our end we check if one of these matches with your password. We show you a warning if it has been leaked before. We never store your password in plain text.

notFoundPage.title: Page not found
notFoundPage.description:
Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.
Please check the URL in the address bar and try again.

contact.desc:
Have something to ask?
Feel free to drop us an email at <mail>{{email}}</mail>

beta.title: Beta
beta.description: This feature is in the Beta phase. Use it with caution as there may be side effects.

profileSettings.noLink: Didn't receive a link to confirm the email address? Request a new one!

footer.slogan: The best apps need the best services.
footer.description: Swetrix is a powerful analytics platform that respects user privacy.
